subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module let use Persona to authenticate users in Lutece
All users having an Persona account can be authenticated by this module. Users who have not already an Persona should create one.
For more information about Persona please refer to links provided in the side bar.

subsection.name: Requirements
subsection.p: This module requires version 2.1.2 or higher of the Lutece kernel (lutece-core)
The plugin MyLutece should be installed in version 2.1.0 or higher

subsection.name: Build and deploy
subsection.p: To build the latest version just follow this steps
(NB: Subversion's client and Maven3 should be installed on your system)

div.pre: $ svn export http://dev.lutece.paris.fr/svn/lutece/portal/trunk/plugins/module-mylutece-persona module-mylutece-persona $ cd module-mylutece-persona $ mvn lutece:assembly

subsection.p: The last command will build the module's package as an archive named module-mylutece-persona-xxx-bin-xxxx.zip in the directory ./target/assembly
To deploy this package, just extract its content in your webapp's root.
